Class PHUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.utilities.PHUtilities

  • public class PHUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utilities for applications using the hue SDK.

    • Method Detail

      • colorFromXY

        public static int colorFromXY(float[] points,
              java.lang.String model)
        Generates the color for the given XY values and light model. Model can be null if it is not known. Note: When the exact values cannot be represented, it will return the closest match. Note 2: This method does not incorporate brightness values. Get/Set it from/to your light seperately.
        Parameters:
        xy - the float array contain x and the y value.
        model - the model of the lamp, example: "LCT001" for hue bulb. Used to calculate the color gamut. If this value is empty the default gamut values are used.
        Returns:
        the android color value. If xy is null OR xy is not an array of size 2, Color. BLACK will be returned

      • calculateXY

        public static float[] calculateXY(int color,
                  java.lang.String model)
        Return x, y value from android color and light model Id. Please note: This method does not incorporate brightness values. Get/set it from/to your light seperately.
        Parameters:
        color - the color value
        model - the model Id of Light
        Returns:
        the float array of length 2, where index 0 and 1 gives x and y values respectively.

      • calculateXYFromRGB

        public static float[] calculateXYFromRGB(int red,
                         int green,
                         int blue,
                         java.lang.String model)
        Return x, y value from RGB values and light model Id.
        Parameters:
        red - the amount of red
        green - the amount of red
        blue - the amount of red
        model - the model Id of Light
        Returns:
        the float array of length 2, where index 0 and 1 gives x and y values respectively.

        public static int dpToPx(int dpi,

        Conversion method for dp to px
        Parameters:
        dpi - The target DPI
        dp - The dp (density independent pixels) value to be converted.
        Returns:

      • pxToDp

        public static double pxToDp(int dpi,
            int px)
        Conversion method for px to dp
        Parameters:
        dpi - The source DPI
        px - The px (pixels) value to be converted.
        Returns:
        The converted value as dp (density independent pixels)
